ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
We meet again, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Could I hang around as a break from training?
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
When I woke up, it was next to my pillow.
It seems someone brought it to me.
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2102_01_10: I’ll give this to you. I know you’ll use it carefully.
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
It’s very useful—and one of my favorite
things, too!
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
I just had to give this to you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
For some reason, when I picked this up, your face
crossed my mind, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2103_03_10: I really hope you like it. What do you think?
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2202_01_10: I’d like to talk to you.
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Talking to you is so comforting. I always look
forward to it.
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2301_01_10: Are you sure I can have it? Thanks! I’ll treasure it!
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I’d like to give you something in return... Let me
think on it.
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
That was time very well spent. Let’s talk again
sometime.
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
The time I spend talking to you seems to pass in
a flash...
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8201_2401_02_10: That was so fun! Let’s talk again!
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
This place is strangely comfortable.
I wonder why...
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
Maybe a ghost Pokémon is hiding nearby?
Just kidding!
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8002_0701_01_10: It’s so nice to be invited by someone.
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
I’ve often met up with others at a meeting point,
but there have been times when someone’s come
to pick me up.
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Once when that happened, the lights in the room
suddenly turned off. It was so lively!
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
A lot of ghost Pokémon like pulling pranks, so I
think you can’t help but brace yourself.
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
They have their own way of thinking and
reasoning.
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
If you understand that, I think you can get along
with them well.
ch0148_00_matsuba_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
If they try to take your soul, give me a shout! I’ll
help you out.
